taskbody.context:
Yeastar S-Series provides web-based configuration interface for administrator and extension users. The administrator can manage the device by logging in the Web interface.
Connect your PC to the same local network of the PBX.

step.cmd: Start a web browser on your PC, enter the default IP address 192.168.5.150, press Enter on your keyboard.
step.info: The web page will inform you that the IP is unsafe.

step.cmd: Ignore the warning on the web page, proceed to the access the IP.
Enter the default user name and password, click Login.
